0.text: Innate: Kha'Zix gains Unseen Threat whenever the enemy loses  sight of him or he activates  Void Assault. Unseen Threat: Kha'Zix empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal 14 − 116 (based on level) (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus magic damage and  slow them by 25% for 2 seconds.
0.html:
Innate: Kha'Zix gains Unseen Threat whenever the enemy loses sight of him or he activates Void Assault.

Unseen Threat: Kha'Zix empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal 14 − 116 (based on level) (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus magic damage and slow them by 25% for 2 seconds.

0.text: 14 − 116 (based on level)

markedPassages: sight
Void Assault
slow

0.text: TARGET RANGE:  325

Passive: Kha'Zix considers any enemy unit to be Isolated if they are not nearby to one of their allies.  Taste Their Fear,  Evolved Reaper Claws, and  Evolved Spike Racks have special interactions against Isolated targets.
0.html: Passive: Kha'Zix considers any enemy unit to be Isolated if they are not nearby to one of their allies. Taste Their Fear, Evolved Reaper Claws, and Evolved Spike Racks have special interactions against Isolated targets.
markedPassages: Taste Their Fear
Evolved Reaper Claws
Evolved Spike Racks

1.text: Active: Kha'Zix slashes the target enemy, dealing physical damage, increased by 110% against Isolated targets.
1.html: Active: Kha'Zix slashes the target enemy, dealing physical damage, increased by 110% against Isolated targets.

0.text: TARGET RANGE:  375
Passive: Kha'Zix gains  50 bonus range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear. Evolved Bonus: If the target is Isolated, the cooldown is  reduced by 45%.
0.html:
Passive: Kha'Zix gains  50 bonus range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.

Evolved Bonus: If the target is Isolated, the cooldown is  reduced by 45%.
markedPassages: 50 bonus range
reduced

0.text: TARGET RANGE: 1025
Active: Kha'Zix fires a bolt of spikes in the target direction that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.
0.html: Active: Kha'Zix fires a bolt of spikes in the target direction that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies.

1.text: Kha'Zix  heals himself if he is within the explosion.
1.html: Kha'Zix heals himself if he is within the explosion.
markedPassages: heals

0.text: Evolved Bonus: Void Spike now fires three clusters in a cone,  slows by 60% and  reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Multiple explosions do not deal extra damage to the same target nor provide Kha'Zix with additional healing.
0.html: Evolved Bonus: Void Spike now fires three clusters in a cone, slows by 60% and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Multiple explosions do not deal extra damage to the same target nor provide Kha'Zix with additional healing.
markedPassages: slows
reveals

1.text: Isolated targets hit by Evolved Spike Racks are  slowed by 90% instead.
1.html: Isolated targets hit by Evolved Spike Racks are slowed by 90% instead.
markedPassages: slowed

0.text: TARGET RANGE: 700
Active: Kha'Zix  leaps to the target location, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies upon landing.
0.html: Active: Kha'Zix leaps to the target location, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies upon landing.
markedPassages: leaps

1.text: Taste Their Fear can be cast during the dash. Leap will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
1.html: Taste Their Fear can be cast during the dash. Leap will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: Taste Their Fear

0.text: TARGET RANGE: 900
Evolved Bonus: Leap gains 200 bonus cast range, and the cooldown  resets upon scoring a champion  takedown.
0.html: Evolved Bonus: Leap gains 200 bonus cast range, and the cooldown  resets upon scoring a champion takedown.
markedPassages: resets
takedown

0.text: CAST TIME: NONE

Passive: Each rank in Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, granting it additional effects. Choosing an ability initiates a 2 second cast time, during which Kha'Zix advances his form, receiving the evolution once it completes.
0.html: Passive: Each rank in Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, granting it additional effects. Choosing an ability initiates a 2 second cast time, during which Kha'Zix advances his form, receiving the evolution once it completes.

1.text: Kha'Zix cannot evolve while he is unable to cast abilities.
1.html: Kha'Zix cannot evolve while he is unable to cast abilities.

2.text: Active: Kha'Zix becomes  invisible for 1.25 seconds, during which he gains  40% bonus movement speed.
2.html: Active: Kha'Zix becomes invisible for 1.25 seconds, during which he gains  40% bonus movement speed.
markedPassages: invisible
40% bonus movement speed

3.text: After 2 seconds of leaving  invisibility, and for the next 10 seconds, Void Assault can be recast at no additional cost.
3.html: After 2 seconds of leaving invisibility, and for the next 10 seconds, Void Assault can be recast at no additional cost.
markedPassages: invisibility

4.text: Recast: Kha'Zix mimics the first cast's effects.

0.text: Evolved Bonus: The  invisibility now lasts 2 seconds, and Void Assault can be recast twice.
0.html: Evolved Bonus: The invisibility now lasts 2 seconds, and Void Assault can be recast twice.
markedPassages: invisibility
